bill.title: Keeping guns out of classrooms.
bill.description: This resolution expresses the sense that federal funds shall not be used to train or arm school personnel with firearms.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

referrals.name: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

history.action: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2735)

Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
